Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Requires solar panels on installed light fixtures
Summary: Requires solar panels on installed light fixtures on all lands, including state parks and parkways, under the jurisdiction of the office.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Add ยง13.08, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to requiring solar panels on installed light fixtures
